sources.full: Way of the Four Elements Remastered

subclass.name: Way of the Four Elements (Remastered)
subclassFeatures: Way of the Four Elements|Monk||Four Elements (Re)|WotFA|3

subclassFeature.name: Way of the Four Elements
entries: Du folgst einer klösterlichen Tradition, die dich lehrt, dir die Elemente nutzbar zu machen. Wenn du dein Ki konzentrierst, kannst du dich mit den Kräften der Schöpfung in Einklang bringen und die vier Elemente nach deinem Willen biegen, indem du sie als Verlängerung deines Körpers benutzt. Einige Mitglieder dieser Tradition widmen sich einem einzigen Element, andere verweben die Elemente miteinander.

Viele Mönche dieser Tradition tätowieren ihre Körper mit Darstellungen ihrer Ki-Kräfte, meist in Form von sich windenden Drachen, aber auch in Form von Phönixen, Fischen, Pflanzen, Bergen und sich überschlagenden Wellen.

subclassFeature.name: Initiate of the Way
entries: Wenn du diese Tradition auf Stufe 3 wählst, lernst du, wie du die vier Elemente auf subtile Weise manipulieren kannst. Du lernst zwei der folgenden Zaubertricks: {@spell control flames|xge}, {@spell gust|xge}, {@spell mold earth|xge}, oder {@spell shape water|xge}. Auf der 6. Stufe lernst du zwei weitere Zaubertricks aus dieser Liste.

subclassFeature.name: Disciple of the Elements
entries: Auf der 3. Stufe erlernst du magische Disziplinen, die sich die Macht der vier Elemente zunutze machen. Für einige Disziplinen musst du Ki-Punkte ausgeben, wenn du sie einsetzt.

Du erlernst zwei Elementardisziplinen deiner Wahl, die in den Abschnitten über die Elementardisziplinen weiter unten beschrieben werden. Du erlernst zwei weitere Elementar-Disziplinen deiner Wahl auf Stufe 6, 11 und 17.
Wenn du eine neue Elementar-Disziplin erlernst, kannst du auch eine bereits erlernte Elementar-Disziplin durch eine andere Disziplin ersetzen.

{@bold @italic Casting Elemental Spells.} Einige Elementar-Disziplinen erlauben es dir, Zauber zu wirken. Siehe Kapitel 10 des Spielerhandbuchs für die allgemeinen Regeln der Zauberei. Um einen dieser Zauber zu wirken, gelten die Zauberzeit und andere Regeln, aber du musst keine materiellen Komponenten für den Zauber bereitstellen. Wenn du einen Zauber mit einer Disziplin wirkst, wird er auf der niedrigsten Stufe des Zaubers gewirkt, sofern nicht anders angegeben.

Sobald du die 5. Stufe in dieser Klasse erreicht hast, kannst du zusätzliche Ki-Punkte ausgeben, um die Stufe eines von dir gewirkten Zaubers der Elementardisziplin zu erhöhen, vorausgesetzt, der Zauber hat einen verstärkten Effekt auf einer höheren Stufe, wie {@spell burning hands} es tut. Die Stufe des Zaubers erhöht sich um 1 für jeden zusätzlichen Ki-Punkt, den du ausgibst. Wenn du zum Beispiel ein Mönch der Stufe 5 bist und {@spell burning hands} "Fegender Schlackenstoß" verwendest, kannst du 2 Ki-Punkte ausgeben, um ihn als Zauber der Stufe 2 zu wirken (die Grundkosten der Disziplin von 1 Ki-Punkt plus 1).

Die maximale Anzahl an Ki-Punkten (seine Basis-Ki-Punkt-Kosten plus alle zusätzlichen Punkte), die du für den Zauber ausgeben kannst, beträgt 2, es sei denn, eine Disziplin legt etwas anderes fest. Dieses Maximum erhöht sich auf 3 auf der 9. Stufe, 4 auf der 13. Stufe und 5 auf der 17. Stufe.

entries.name: Become the Teapot
entries: Du rollst mit der eintreffenden Energie, stimmst dich auf das Element ein und wirst es. Du kannst 1 Ki-Punkt ausgeben, um zu wirken {@spell absorb elements|xge}.

entries.name: Effortless Step
entries: Die Luft um dich herum arbeitet im Einklang mit deinen Bewegungen und hebt dich beim Sprung in die Höhe. Deine Sprunghöhe und -weite werden verdoppelt (mit Schritt des Windes vervierfacht) und du erhältst einen Vorteil bei Stärke-(Athletik)-Prüfungen im Zusammenhang mit dem Springen.

entries.name: Enduring Mountain Stance
entries: Dein Körper und dein Geist werden so starr und unnachgiebig wie der Boden unter dir. Dein Ki verwurzelt deine Füße in den Boden und du wirst unbeweglich. Wenn du die {@action Dodge}-Aktion einsetzt, kannst du bis zum Beginn deiner nächsten Runde nicht mehr gegen deinen Willen bewegt, geschubst, gepackt, erschreckt oder zu Boden geworfen werden, selbst wenn du magisch dazu gezwungen wirst. Du musst auf dem Boden stehen, um diese Fähigkeit zu nutzen.

entries.name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
entries: Deine Arme und Beine werden von brüllenden Flammengüssen umhüllt. Wenn du in deinem Zug einen waffenlosen Angriff ausführst, kannst du wählen, ob du Ranken aus Flammen ausstoßen willst, die sich über deine normale Reichweite hinaus erstrecken. Deine Reichweite erhöht sich für diesen Angriff um 5 Fuß und er verursacht Feuerschaden anstelle von Wuchtschaden. Wenn der Angriff trifft, kannst du 1 Ki-Punkt ausgeben, um einen zusätzlichen {@dice 1d10} Feuerschaden zu verursachen.

entries.name: Fang of the Frost Wolf
entries: Du beschwörst einen Splitter aus rasiermesserscharfem Eis und schleuderst ihn auf deinen Feind. Du kannst 1 Ki-Punkt für den Wurf ausgeben {@spell ice knife|xge}.

entries.name: Fist of Four Thunders
entries: Du schlägst deine Fäuste vor dir zusammen und verursachst einen donnernden Knall, der alles um dich herum wegbläst. Du kannst 1 Ki-Punkt für diesen Zauber ausgeben {@spell thunderwave}.

entries.name: Fist of Unbroken Air
entries: You summon a swirling wind and concentrate it around your fist. When you make an unarmed attack on your turn, you can choose to strike out condensed bursts of air which stretch out beyond your normal reach. Your reach increases by 10 feet for that attack. If the attack hits you can spend 1 ki point to force the target to make a Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet and be knocked {@condition prone}.

entries.name: Golden Snake's Icy Path
entries: Whenever you take the {@action Dash} action, until the end of your turn for any movement you make along a surface you can leave a trail of slippery ice. This ice counts as difficult terrain and lasts until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Rumbling Badger
entries: You shake the ground, causing a tremor that knocks over your foes. You can spend 1 ki point to cast {@spell earth tremor|xge}.

entries.name: Rush of Gale Spirits
entries: You send a blast of air outward with a thrust of your open palm. You can spend 2 ki points to cast {@spell gust of wind}.

entries.name: Shape the Raincloud
entries: You can spend 1 ki point to cast {@spell create or destroy water}.

entries.name: Sweeping Cinder Strike
entries: With a wide sweeping gesture, you summon forth a barrage of hot cinders. You can spend 1 ki point to cast {@spell burning hands}.

entries.name: Water Whip
entries: You summon a long, rubbery whip of pure water that you grip by one end. You can spend 1 ki point as a bonus action to create a whip of water that shoves and pulls a creature to unbalance it. A creature that you can see that is within 30 feet of you must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Martial Arts die + your Wisdom modifier, plus an extra {@dice 1d10} bludgeoning damage for each additional ki point you spend, and you can either knock it {@condition prone} or pull it up to 25 feet closer to you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and you don't pull it or knock it {@condition prone}. You can't use Water Whip and cast a spell during the same turn.

entries.name: A Leaf on the Wind
entries: A powerful wind rises up to catch you as you fall. Your Slow Fall ability no longer requires a reaction to use, and instead you may use it automatically whenever you are conscious and not incapacitated, and it negates all falling damage regardless of distance. When you use the Slow Fall ability, you may also glide along the air to move 5 feet in any horizontal direction for every 5 feet that you fall.

entries.name: Burning Ember Flourish
entries: You reach out with your ki to snuff out a source of fire, causing it to go out with a bang or to sputter black smoke. You can spend 2 ki points to cast {@spell pyrotechnics|xge}.

entries.name: Crushing Hand of the Mountain
entries: You focus your strength into your outstretched fist, summoning a hand of earth from the ground. You can spend 2 ki points to cast {@spell Maximilian's earthen grasp|xge}.

entries.name: Curtain of Unyielding Wind
entries: You let out a fierce howl as a mighty wind begins swirling around you. You can spend 2 ki points to cast {@spell warding wind|xge}.

entries.name: Gong of the Summit
entries: You strike the air as if it were a gong. You can spend 2 ki points to cast {@spell shatter}.

entries.name: Hatchling's Flame
entries: You focus your ki into a torrent of fire that streaks away from you. You can spend 2 ki points to cast {@spell Aganazzar's scorcher|xge}.

entries.name: Impenetrable Iron Tortoise Shell
entries: You summon an earthen barrier to defend yourself or an ally. As a reaction, you may spend 2 ki points to use your Deflect Missiles ability against an attack you can see within 30 feet of you. Any damage not prevented by this ability is taken by the original target of the attack. If you reduce the damage to 0, you can't make an attack with it.

entries.name: Mote of the Sun
entries: Your ki manifests as a roaring orb of fire. You can spend 2 ki points to cast {@spell flaming sphere}.

entries.name: Patient Badger Listens
entries: You reach out with your ki to the ground beneath you. You can spend 2 ki points as a bonus action to gain tremorsense with a range of 30 feet and a burrow speed equal to half of your walking speed for up to 1 minute. Your movement leaves behind a tunnel that remains for as long as this ability is active, and then collapses.

entries.name: Red Dragon's Claws
entries: Rays of fire spring from your outstretched hand to sear your foes. You can spend 2 ki points to cast {@spell scorching ray}.

entries.name: Swarming Ice Rabbit
entries: A flurry of magic snowballs erupts from a point you choose within range. You can spend 2 ki points to cast {@spell Snilloc's snowball swarm|xge}.

entries.name: Water Jet
entries: You can spend 2 ki points as an action to unleash a jet of water in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a Strength saving throw, taking bludgeoning damage equal to your Martial Arts die + your Wisdom modifier on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, you can move each target that fails its saving throw to any unoccupied space touching the line.

entries.name: Dance of Three Ways
entries: You summon six spheres of earth from the ground, suspend them in the air around you, and ignite them with your fiery ki. With a thought, you launch these blazing meteors at your foe. You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell Melf's minute meteors|xge}.

entries.name: Earth Reaches for Sky
entries: Focusing your strength with a deep, rumbling shout, you swing your arms up high, causing an eruption of churned earth and stone that engulfs your foes. You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell erupting earth|xge}.

entries.name: Eternal Mountain Defense
entries: Your body hardens to stone, nearly impervious to weapons. You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell stoneskin}, targeting yourself.

entries.name: Flames of the Phoenix
entries: With a hand motion, you conjure a tiny bead of burning energy. You spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell fireball}.

entries.name: Fist of the Elements
entries: The elements swirl around your weapon. You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell elemental weapon}, choosing from only the damage types cold, fire, or thunder. Your unarmed strikes count as a weapon for the purposes of this discipline.

entries.name: Hua's Water Prison
entries: You conjure up a sphere of water that engulfs and imprisons foes that touch its surface. You can spend 4 ki to cast {@spell watery sphere|xge}.

entries.name: Mist Stance
entries: A swirling mist envelopes your body and you merge with it, becoming a cloud. You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell gaseous form}, targeting yourself.

entries.name: One with the Tides
entries: You reach out with your ki and become one with water. You spend 2 ki points as an action to gain underwater adaptations for 8 hours. While this ability is active, you can breath normally underwater, you gain a swim speed equal to your walking speed, and you gain blindsight with a radius of 60 feet while underwater.

entries.name: Rain of the Frigid Glacier
entries: You cool the air in the skies above you, condensing the water droplets into freezing rain and sleet. You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell sleet storm}.

entries.name: Raise the Troubled Earth
entries: You stir the earth around you into action, summoning a wall of sand to serve as your barricade. You can spend 3 ki to cast {@spell wall of sand|xge}.

entries.name: Raise the Still Waters
entries: Though water can give way easily, it can just as easily offer great resistance. You can spend 3 ki to cast {@spell wall of water|xge}.

entries.name: Ride the Wind
entries: You summon a mighty wind that envelopes your body, sweeping you to where you want to go. You spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell fly}, targeting yourself, except your fly speed is equal to your movement speed.

entries.name: River of Hungry Flame
entries: You sweep your hands upward, causing a wall of blazing hot fire to leap up from the ground. You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell wall of fire}.

entries.name: Sea's Fury
entries: You conjure up a mighty wave of water that crashes down on your foes. You can spend 3 ki to cast {@spell tidal wave|xge}.

entries.name: Shape of the Flowing River
entries: You touch the body of water with your ki, coaxing it to change its form. You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell control water}.

entries.name: Spellfist Stance
entries: You effortlessly flow between martial and elemental assault. When you use your action to use an elemental discipline, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action, or you can use your Flurry of Blows.

entries.name: Avatar of the Elements
entries: As an ultimate display of your mastery of the elements, you can spend 5 ki as an action to have the elements of earth, fire, air, and water form a protective sphere around your body, gaining multiple benefits for 1 minute. While this ability is active, you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, slashing, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage. You also gain a burrow, fly, and swim speed equal to your movement speed. Lastly, you can use any of the following abilities as a bonus action:

* You create a small earthquake on the ground in a 15-foot radius around you. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@dice 1d6} bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

* You create a line of fire 15 feet long and 5 feet wide extending from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 3d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

* You create a 15-foot cube of swirling wind centered on a point you can see within 60 feet of you. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 1d10} bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a Large or smaller creature fails the save, that creature is also pushed up to 10 feet away from the center of the cube.

* You create a 15-foot cone of ice shards extending from your outstretched hand in a direction you choose. Each creature in the cone must make a Constitution save throw. A creature takes {@dice 2d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails its save against this effect has its speed halved until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Breath of Winter
entries: You inhale deeply and then exhale, blasting a cone of frigid air out in front of you that freezes everything in its path. You can spend 5 ki points to cast {@spell cone of cold}.

entries.name: Eyes of Fire
entries: Your foes may try to hide in darkness, but their ki lights up like a torch to you. You may cast {@spell see invisibility} without expending any ki. In addition, while under the effects of see invisibility, you may spend 2 ki points as a bonus action to gain truesight until the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Eye of the Hurricane
entries: You stretch out your ki to embrace the winds. You can spend 5 ki points to cast {@spell control winds|xge}.

entries.name: Mold the Mountain
entries: You master the many forms that earth may take. You can spend 5 ki to cast {@spell transmute rock|xge}.

entries.name: Swirling Crab's Revenge
entries: Your ki manifests as a swirling pool of water, smashing and pulling your foes towards its center. You can spend 5 ki points to cast {@spell maelstrom|xge}.

entries.name: Wave of Rolling Earth
entries: The ground shakes and emits a low rumble as a wall of stone erupts up into being. You can spend 5 ki points to cast {@spell wall of stone}.
